content: How might the Future Perfect tense be utilized to revise the sentence "He will finish his homework"?

To revise the sentence "He will finish his homework" using the Future Perfect tense, you would say: "He will have finished his homework." 

This construction indicates that the action of finishing the homework will be completed at some specific point in the future. The Future Perfect tense is often used to express an action that will have been completed before another action or a specific time in the future.
